alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Madison; Oneida; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued December 18 at 7:31AM EST until December 18 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northern Chenango County in central New York... Madison County in central New York... South Central Oneida County in central New York... Northwestern Otsego County in central New York... * Until 1045 AM EST. * At 731 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Oneida, Norwich, Hamilton, Sullivan, Chittenango, Cazenovia, Brookfield, Morrisville, Stockbridge, Augusta, Nelson, Plymouth, North Norwich, Waterville, Sherburne, Lebanon, Otselic, New Berlin, Columbus and Georgetown. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
